companies.name: UnifyApps
companies.reason: Founded in 2023, UnifyApps has gained attention as an 'enterprise operating system for AI,' showcasing innovative capabilities in the fast-growing AI sector. Its recent funding round attracted significant investment, indicating strong market interest.

companies.name: Neurons
companies.reason: Neurons is recognized for its advancements in AI-driven solutions, making headlines for innovative products in cognitive technology, aiming to enhance user experience in digital platforms.

companies.name: Perplexity AI
companies.reason: This startup is gaining traction for its cutting-edge approach to natural language processing and artificial intelligence applications, frequently mentioned as one of the fastest-growing tech companies.
